title: MEMORY MAN
author: David Baldacci
description: A police detective uses his extraordinary memory when tackling the case of his family's murder.

title: COUNTRY
author: Danielle Steel
description: After her husband’s sudden death, a woman falls in love with a country music superstar.

title: THE STRANGER
author: Harlan Coben
description: When a woman's devastating secret is mysteriously revealed to her husband, much more than their marriage is suddenly in danger.

title: RUNAWAY VAMPIRE
author: Lynsay Sands
description: In this Argeneau series novel, after a woman hits and injures Dante Notte with her R.V., the pair find they have dangerous enemies in common.

title: REVENGE
author: Lisa Jackson
description: Collected in one volume, the author's Love Letters trilogy, about secrets revealed when the head of a town's wealthiest family is murdered.

title: FIGHTING DIRTY
author: Lori Foster
description: An M.M.A. fighter and ladies' man falls for his best friend's sister, who sees past his bad-boy persona.

title: STARLIGHT ON WILLOW LAKE
author: Susan Wiggs
description: This novel in the Lakeshore Chronicles series brings together a young caregiver, an accident victim and the recovering woman's distant son.

title: THE CHOICE
author: Nicholas Sparks
description: When Travis meets his new neighbor, his bachelor status erodes.

title: THE BONE TREE
author: Greg Iles
description: In the second book of a trilogy, following “Natchez Burning,” the prosecutor Penn Cage’s attempt to find his father, a doctor who has gone into hiding after the murder of his African-American nurse, brings him up against the Ku Klux Klan.

title: DEVOTED IN DEATH
author: J D Robb
description: Lt. Eve Dallas races the clock to save a woman kidnapped by a couple on a murder spree; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
